::Grounded/Seekker::
Grounded not knowing where he had been walks out of the 
bridge.  "What's going on over here?"

Seekker " haha weakling Axis....let the big guns go at it"....he 
walks over and the tiny bot grips the pod and with one heroic feat of 
strength....does nothing.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., rauq@t... wrote:
> --- Lynxiz / Axis / Lokk ---
> 
> Lynxiz approaches Trinity and Zero, "I'm Lynxiz, visiting from the 
> Maximals, who are you?" She had been around the corner, and hadn't 
> heard the bot's name, if it had been said.
> 
> Axis and Co. arrive at the signal site to discover it empty. "Whoa, 
> there's nothing here?!" exclaims Axis. Lokk detaches from Axis, and 
> transforms, "I guess somebody got here before us. " Axis 
nods, "Maybe 
> we should take the pod with us, Grounded or on of the other 
> Chivitrons might be able to use it." Axis transforms into robot 
mode, 
> and walks over to the pod, then tries to lift it.
